project_metadata.description: A cohesive Domain Model for an E-Commerce Platform, synthesizing Bounded Contexts for Customer, Order, Inventory, and Payment Management.

bounded_contexts.description: Manages all aspects of customer profiles, including personal information, addresses, and wishlists.

entities.name: Customer
entities.description: Represents an individual or entity that interacts with the platform, primarily for purchasing products.

entities.name: Wishlist
entities.description: A curated collection of desired products maintained by a Customer.

value_objects.name: Address
value_objects.description: Represents a physical mailing or shipping location for a Customer.

bounded_contexts.description: Handles the entire lifecycle of customer orders, from creation and confirmation to shipping and delivery.

entities.name: Order
entities.description: Represents a customer's confirmed intention to purchase a set of products.

entities.name: OrderItem
entities.description: Represents a specific product and its quantity included within an Order.

value_objects.name: OrderStatus
value_objects.description: The current state of an order, e.g., Pending, Confirmed, Shipped, Delivered, Cancelled.

bounded_contexts.description: Manages the product catalog, including product details, categories, and real-time stock levels.

entities.name: Product
entities.description: A tangible item available for purchase, identified by a unique SKU.

entities.name: Category
entities.description: A classification used for organizing products within the catalog.

value_objects.name: StockLevel
value_objects.description: Represents the inventory status for a specific Product, including available, reserved, and reorder point quantities.

value_objects.name: Money
value_objects.description: A monetary value expressed with an amount and its corresponding currency. Used for prices, costs, and payments.

bounded_contexts.description: Manages the processing of financial transactions, including payments and refunds, for customer orders.

entities.name: Payment
entities.description: Records a financial transaction made for an Order, identified by a unique transaction ID.

value_objects.name: PaymentMethodInfo
value_objects.description: Contains details about the payment instrument used, such as credit card or digital wallet.

value_objects.name: PaymentStatus
value_objects.description: The current state of a payment transaction, e.g., Initiated, Completed, Failed, Refunded.

value_objects.name: Money
value_objects.description: A monetary value expressed with an amount and its corresponding currency. Used for prices, costs, and payments.
